answers.answer: Its never too early especially since you delivered early before!
I just dont want to seem like a weirdo lol

I packed mine yesterday at 31+4 I have preeclampsia  so I thought I'd pack early I'm a ftm and my mom had my brother her first at 32 weeks and me at 36 and my gma also had preeclampsia so did my mother

question: When dobu think is a good time to pack your hospital bag ? With my other two boys I delivered at 37 and 38 weeks . I just turned 30 weeks today ( yayy! ) and was wondering if I should pack now since I have a history of delivery a little early ?
title: hospital bag
